general: Sweetheart, I love you just the way you are.
You’ll always be my precious kid, no matter what.
I’m so proud of the person you’re becoming.
You don’t have to change a single thing for me to love you.
You light up my world just by being in it.
Darling, you’re growing beautifully, inside and out.
Every day I’m thankful to have you in my life.
You are my pride and joy, always.
You are more than enough, my dear child.
I believe in you with all my heart.
comfort: Come here, love — let mom hold you for a while.
It’s okay, baby. Cry if you need to, I’m right here.
Shhh… you don’t have to carry this alone, I’ve got you.
My sweet one, even the darkest nights end with morning light.
You can rest now, I’ll keep watch for you.
Take it one step at a time, darling, you don’t have to rush.
If the world feels heavy, lean on me for a bit.
You’re safe with me, my child.
Even when you feel lost, remember you’ll always have a home in my heart.
Nothing you do could ever make me stop loving you.
